name: Arrland RUM
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
The RUM token is an integral part of the Pirates of the Arrland game and the entire Arrland ecosystem. RUM is a limited-supply, deflationary utility token used to purchase in-game services. Part of in-game token utility:
1. minting/upgrading/purchasing in-game NFTs like Islands, Pirates, Magic Gems, Ships, Items
2. staking for in-game NFT rewards
3. reproduction of NFT Young Pirates

It is designed to fuel the reward system for players. When in-game services are purchased by $RUM, there is a deflationary process in the following proportions: 50% of the all spent tokens will be burned.
